mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.nickNM, C.img_addr FROM post_table A INNER JOIN user_table B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN post_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard WHERE A.iuser=${iuser})D GROUP BY D.iboard ORDER BY D.iboard desc LIMIT ${startPage},9

SELECT B.iboard, B.iuser,E.nickNM AS writer ,B.title, B.cntFav, B.season, C.img_addr FROM post_fav A INNER JOIN post_table B ON A.iboard=B.iboard INNER JOIN user_table E ON B.iuser=E.iuser LEFT JOIN post_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard WHERE A.iuser=${iuser} GROUP BY B.iboard ORDER BY iboard desc LIMIT ${startPage},9;
